mapper.select: SELECT board.bno, board.btitle, board.bcontent, COUNT(comment.cno) AS comment_count FROM board LEFT JOIN comment ON board.bno = comment.bno WHERE board.btype = 0 GROUP BY board.bno, board.btitle, board.bcontent ORDER BY board.bno DESC;
SELECT bno, btitle, bcontent, bdate FROM board WHERE bno=#{bno}

SELECT comment.hno, comment.dno, comment.cno, comment.cdate, comment.ccontent FROM comment LEFT JOIN board ON comment.bno = board.bno WHERE board.bno = #{bno} AND comment.dno IS NOT NULL GROUP BY comment.hno, comment.dno, comment.cdate, comment.ccontent ORDER BY comment.cno DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (btitle, bcontent, bdate, btype, mno) VALUES (#{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bdate}, #{btype}, #{mno})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(cno) FROM comment WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (bno, dno, hno, cno, ccontent, cdate) VALUES (#{bno}, #{dno}, #{hno}, #{cno}, #{ccontent}, #{cdate})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment WHERE bno = #{bno} AND cno = #{cno}
mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM board b WHERE b.btitle LIKE CONCAT('%', '${searchWord}', '%') OR b.bcontent LIKE CONCAT('%', '${searchWord}', '%') OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM comment c WHERE c.bno = b.bno AND c.ccontent LIKE CONCAT('%', '${searchWord}', '%'));
